        • 1.1.2. Jump [ec2-user@ip-10-0-0-51 ~]$ nc localhost 55000

      • 1.2. local port forwarding
        • 1.2.1. Kiosk - [root@localhost kioskoperator]# ssh -L 23:localhost:56000 -i /tmp/blob ec2-user@52.20.220.102
        • 1.2.2. Kiosk [root@localhost kioskoperator]# nc localhost 23
        • 1.2.3. jump [ec2-user@ip-10-0-0-51 ~]$ nc -l 56000

    SSH tunnels

    remote port forwarding

    Kiosk ssh -R 55000:localhost:5900 -i ~/jumpna ec2-user@52.20.220.102

    Jump [ec2-user@ip-10-0-0-51 ~]$ nc localhost 55000

    lskjfsd

    Kiosk nc -l localhost 5900

    lskjfsd

    https://w.amazon.com/index.php/AmazonLocker/Kiosk_Network/ReverseSSH_POC

    local port forwarding

    Kiosk - [root@localhost kioskoperator]# ssh -L 23:localhost:56000 -i /tmp/blob ec2-user@52.20.220.102

    Kiosk [root@localhost kioskoperator]# nc localhost 23

    sdfdsa

    jump [ec2-user@ip-10-0-0-51 ~]$ nc -l 56000

    sdfdsa
